trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de gatilho que altera a velocidade de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> ação com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> ou <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para controlar a taxa de velocidade do storyboard interativamente.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> para especificar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> a velocidade da animação como uma razão da velocidade da animação antigo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> como 2, a velocidade de duas vezes o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animações e se você definir um valor de 0,5, reduzir a velocidade de 50 por cento.

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto afeta o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> na qualquer momento após o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> começa.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio>, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você parar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> e usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio>, quando você retomar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, ele usa o novo índice de velocidade.

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> deve fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar ou controlar um Storyboard interativamente

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma nova velocidade de animação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> como uma razão da velocidade da animação antiga.
A taxa de velocidade para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para especificar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> a velocidade da animação como uma razão da velocidade da animação antigo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> como 2, a velocidade de duas vezes o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animações e se você definir um valor de 0,5, reduzir a velocidade de 50 por cento.
